Presumptive Disabilities Under 38 CFR 3.320b
Effective January 10, 2025, VA established
38 CFR 3.320b
, which created presumptive SC for covered Veterans for the following disabilities:
acute leukemias
chronic leukemias
multiple myelomas, including monoclonal gammopathy of undetermined significance
myelodysplastic syndromes, and
myelofibrosis.
